document_data.name: Entar III Silvershield
document_data.mainbody: '''Entar Silvershield''' was a nobleman from the wealthy [[Silvershield]] family living in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century.{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-10-09 - Silvershield family (Part 2)}}{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-10-09 - Silvershield family (Part 1)}}
document_data.Relationships:
Entar was the younger son of [[Torlin Silvershield]] and [[Evelyn Silvershield]].

Entar's son [[Parendarkh Silvershield|Parendarkh]] left the family after a quarrel, but he still lived in Baldur's Gate in the {{YearlinkName|1494}}.
document_data.History:
Entar was born in the Silvershield family and lived in the [[Silvershield estate]] in Baldur's Gate. In the {{YearlinkName|1482}}, Entar was six and he was living in the estate's nursery with his sister [[Alana Silvershield|Alana]].

He had children<ref group="note">According to [[Ed Greenwood]]'s tweet, in noble circles of Baldur's Gate, wasn't uncommon to arrange marriages involving very young individuals, often intended to solidify legacies and alliances. Nevertheless, this tradition was losing popularity as the years go by, largely due to widespread dissatisfaction in these unions.<ref group="note">It could be that the same spell that had accelerated [[Skie Silvershield II|Skie's]] aging, was cast upon Entar., but some of them left Baldur's Gate in the 1470s [[DR]] and there was no information about where they had gone or what had become of them.
